snippet: News Corporation wanted to own the British Sky Broadcasting Group, Britain’s largest satellite broadcaster, outright but its stake has been threatened by the phone-hacking scandal at one of its newspapers.
abstract: News Corporation wanted to own the British Sky Broadcasting Group, Britain’s largest satellite broadcaster, outright but its stake has been threatened by the phone-hacking scandal at one of its newspapers.

headline.main: Comcast Is Said to Be Mulling Bid for BSkyB
headline.print_headline: Comcast Said to Study Buying Part Of BSkyB
